content.webTitle: Nick Denton interviewed: The Brit dishing the dirt on America

fields.headline: Nick Denton interviewed: The Brit dishing the dirt on America
fields.bodyText: Today's Observer has an interesting interview with Nick Denton -- a Brit building a blogging empire in the US -- by his old mate Jay Rayner. Although his company has successful blogs such as Gawker, Gizmodo and Lifehacker, it has increased in prominence this year by carring a video that "features Tom Cruise extolling the virtues of Scientology and is both compulsive viewing and buttock-clenchingly embarrassing". The Observer also has a feature on The world's 50 most powerful blogs, as Bobbie Johnson has posted over at our PDA blog.
